com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.services

Class CategoryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.services.CategoryService

  • @Service
public class CategoryService
extends Object
    This is a Service Class for the generated entity Category that does the CRUD operations by making calls to the Repository of the appropriate type.
    Since:
    2018-11-15
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Aaron

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CategoryService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCategory(CategoryDTO categoryDTO)
      This method creates a category based on the information provided by the categoryDTO received from the REST Controller.
      void deleteCategory(int id)
      This method deletes a category with a specific id.
      List<CategoryDTO> getAllCategories()
      This method calls the categoryRepository to retrieve all the records in the category table in the database and putting the information of the entity object into a categoryDTO object.
      void updateCategories(List<CategoryDTO> categoryDTOList)
      This method updates the categories along with the goals within them after receiving a list of List of CategoryDTOs.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CategoryService

        public CategoryService()

    • Method Detail

      • getAllCategories

        public List<CategoryDTO> getAllCategories()
        This method calls the categoryRepository to retrieve all the records in the category table in the database and putting the information of the entity object into a categoryDTO object.
        Returns:
        A List of CategoryDTO after the repository retrieves the Category entity and data of the entity have been transferred to the DTO

      • updateCategories

        public void updateCategories(List<CategoryDTO> categoryDTOList)
        This method updates the categories along with the goals within them after receiving a list of List of CategoryDTOs.
        Parameters:
        categoryDTOList - This CategoryDTOList contains the updated information that needs be updated into the database.

      • createCategory

        public void createCategory(CategoryDTO categoryDTO)
        This method creates a category based on the information provided by the categoryDTO received from the REST Controller.
        Parameters:
        categoryDTO - This CategoryDTO contains the information that is needed to create a category record in the database.

      • deleteCategory

        public void deleteCategory(int id)
        This method deletes a category with a specific id. If the category has goals in it, it will first delete the goals before deleting the category.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the category that needs to be deleted.
